sources.title: The Mummy's Curse (1944)
sources.description: An irrigation project in the rural bayous of Louisiana unearths living mummy Kharis, who was buried in quicksand twenty-five years earlier. Â

metadata.Plot: An irrigation project in the rural bayous of Louisiana unearths living mummy Kharis, who was buried in quicksand twenty-five years earlier.
metadata.Writer: Bernard Schubert, Leon Abrams, Dwight V. Babcock
metadata.Actors: Lon Chaney Jr., Peter Coe, Virginia Christine
